title: Patches are not applying after saving in X64dbg
content:
I'm new to this and I used X64 debugger for a short while

The thing is , I was testing the security for some software (for educational purposes only!) and finally I found a way break into it , but when I save the work and changes don't apply !

The part where the arrow points in the image never change form je to jne :

Any idea why ?

comments.text: I noticed that the program was packed with UPX , after unpacking it all went fine .
